title: On the plot area excluding area to be handed over to MCGM/Appropriate Authority in lieu of Reservation/ Existing amenity in the DP/ proposed DP roads/prescribed RL under MMC Act
clause_text: On the plot area excluding area to be handed over to MCGM/Appropriate Authority in lieu of Reservation/ Existing amenity in the DP/ proposed DP roads/prescribed RL under MMC Act. The grant of additional FSI as stated above shall be subject to following conditions,
